column2: Text
En-suites are weird. I get having a private bathroom away from guests, but I don't want to her my partner have a shit.
Bus passengers who riding the bell at stops where the bus will clearly stop, like a station, should be barred from TfL services.
The ITV hub is by far the worst designed app in existence. It's clearly never been through any QA testing. Everyone about it is so fucking poor
Sharing a bed with your spouse doesn't have to mean sharing covers. Get three blankets: one for you, one for them, and a third one that serves as the Blanket of Togetherness.
Nobody's obligated to be with you or have sex with you, but it still sucks to be rejected. You're allowed to be sad about it, you just shouldn't blame the person who rejected you.
If it hadn't been for Ian Curtis tragic death, Joy Division would have been about as big as Wire and Gang of Four.
School proms have no place in British culture. By all means hold an event to celebrate finishing school but call it a leavers party or summer ball. We're not fucking Americans.
Beans and toast with cheese is not a meal you look forward to, but when it comes to eating it you realise it's a champions league level meal. Pound for pound the best meal out there
Teenagers, the difficulties you face now will be revealed in time to be absolute trivia compared to the towering wall of shit that arrives in your 40s.
The M6 offers an almost endless procession of places no one wants to go to.
They shouldn't sell multipack single fingers under the Twix name, it's false advertising. Should really be called Unix.

Hardly anyone under 35 has any idea about stars of the golden age of Hollywood: Cary Grant, Bogart, John Wayne, James Stewart, Hepburn, Stanwyck etc. A shame that fixtures of several generations' lives - including Gen X who saw TV reruns - can just vanish like that.
Smaller dogs are better. Firstly, you can pick them up. Secondly, even more cute. Thirdly, they have cute little small dog ideas and you can see that on their faces.
There needs to be an emoji for 'This meeting could have been an email'.
There's no way He Man's clothes were optimal for fighting.
If a horse has to be destroyed after a fall during a race so should the jockey.

Add your unpopular opinions to the form:

Maybe you hate John Barrowman?

https://t.co/jM15jNC318
The main act of sex is always fun, but the cuddling each other after is always better
There is no such thing as a kitchen knife that never needs sharpening. Not in 2022 and not in 1986 when you bought these blunt as all fuck knives, Mum.
'Shotgun' by George Ezra is just 'baby shark' rehashed. Same key, chord progression. That's why kids love it. Awful song but clever
Peaky Blinders is literally just a Catherine Cookson story with guns

Anyone who says the day they got married was the happiest day of their lives is a sad bastard. In reality it's just the government approved formalisation of an existing relationship, no more exciting than receiving your first passport with a few drinks tacked on the end.
It's perfectly fine to go to the shops in the middle of the day and drop your kids off at school in your pyjamas and dressing gown. Live and let live you massive classist Tories.
There is no worse genre of comedy than improv, amateur or professional it's like the worst students you knew being "wacky" on stage
Every Byrds cover of Bob Dylan is superior to the original.
People that leave flowers at makeshift roadside memorials that are in non-biodegradable packaging are selfish bastards.
Oreo's are fucking awful, and you know it. So put them back on the shelf and buy proper biscuits, like chocolate Hob-Nobs.
Netflix takes a 'throw enough shit at a wall and some'll stick' approach to making tv. Apple TV has hardly any content but a high percentage of it is good
To succeed, all you to be is better than average.
Nothing will annoy a man more than a woman asking him to do something he was going to do anyway.
The overflow drain on modern baths is far too low. I would like the water to cover more than my thighs please.
Beer should be enjoyed from a glass. If you're swigging it from a bottle or even worse, a can, then you are a savage.

Tours should include 2 nights in each city. One for introverts who actually want to enjoy the music & one for the annoying extroverts to stand there having full blown conversations, live stream themselves singing & constantly barge their way through the crowd to & from the bar
Posting your AncestryDNA results makes you look fashy.

It's not just that I don't think the afterlife exists. The idea of my conscious existence lasting forever is unbearable and the assumption that it will at some point end a great comfort.
If you've got enough money that it's worth your while participating in some complex tax avoidance scheme, then you've definitely got enough money to afford to pay your full tax bill.

Arguments against inheritance tax based on 'I worked hard for my money' fail at first hurdle: the point is that the kids who inherited it did nothing to earn it. Why should they benefit from an unearned windfall any more than anyone else?

John Wayne's politics were awful but he was a great movie star: there's something very engaging and relaxing about watching him - and listening to that unique voice - and he made about a dozen movies that are absolute classics.

Pop artists should be able to release at least one record a year, given the massive technological advantages they have over their forebears. Can't really complain about not being able to make a living in the streaming world if you're bashing out 2-3 albums a decade.
The shiny side on foil goes on the inside otherwise you're just reflecting the heat, dimwit
The only bad thing about Armando Iannucci's writing is his titles. Veep? Rubbish
No mate, you very much do NOT need your own football podcast with the lads. It's an oversaturated 'market' and you're not half as funny or interesting as you think you are.
The plastic seal on the top of milk cartons is the most irritating of all litter. Too small to justify a trip to the bin and yet makes the kitchen look untidy.
If you have more than 3 kids they will basically end up being neglected one way or another.

Several supermarkets have a service where they will take ALL your soft plastic waste and recycle it. And yet people hardly use it. Hate Tesco all you want but that says something about us and our attitude to the environment.
People shouldn't be allowed on ski holidays until they've taught their kids to carry skis correctly
Anyone who steers their car/van with the flat of their hand is guaranteed to be a twat
Only nonces and grandparents want to see kids' photos on social media. WhatsApp the pictures to your mum.
If your social media bio has 'Bantersaurus Rex' or 'Archbishop of Barnterbury' in it, I can almost guarantee that you are a massive twat in real life, and your 'friends' secretly hate you.
David Bowie's best album is his Greatest Hits

I thought the recent attempts at reviving Spitting Image would be brilliant, given the state of things since 2016. Sadly they were crap. Satire is now democratically in the hands of the Internet and it's much better this way.

Add your unpopular opinions to the form:

Cafés serving scones or tea cakes with only one portion of butter should be shut down. It's two, one per half as a minimum

If you get married abroad and expect people to go you're a narcissistic little shit
If there was a way of choosing what to dream about, men would choose sex every time.
Sofa Beds are a lie. They are comfortable as neither. People who buy them for use by visiting guests should be forced to use them every other day that someone is not stopping over.
Just because you're stuck in your own nostalgic bubble of music, it doesn't mean modern music is shit. Try listening to something new, you never know you might actually like it.
If Gordon Brown hadn't apologised to that bigot for saying she's a bigot, then maybe bigots wouldn't feel like they have such free rein nowadays.
You don't have to stick that bag of warm salad in every takeaway curry you produce, no fucker eats it. Stick an extra poppadom in instead. Thanks.
Mums' WhatsApp groups are a cesspit of bitterness, jealousy, competitiveness and malice. Dads' are mainly shit jokes and tits.

Once a song has been on an advert it should never be played on the radio again. It doesn't sound the same anymore.
Alexa and all other voice assistants are a complete gimmick, and after a week at most become nothing more than extremely expensive, unnecessarily complicated cooking timers.
The King of the meal deal is Boots the Chemist. So more choice than supermarkets. The worst is Sainsburys
Unless you have written a book which is academic, well researched and factual, I do not care more about your statement if you add "in my book" to it.
All single-artist compilation albums should be in chronological order. Any other way is just a way to gloss over that their music eventually turned to shit.
All Milkshakes should be thick by law. 15 minutes to drink thick. Anything else is just flavoured milk.
Stop writing novels where the POV shifts from character to character in first person. It's so disconcerting.

By 2026, not one person in the UK will admit that ten years before they voted for Brexit and thought it was a good idea. By 2030, not one person on the planet will admit they were an anti-vaxxer during the Covid pandemic.
3 pints on a night out is more than enough for anybody.
Every 10th car that runs off the production line should be painted exactly the same as a police car. Driving standards would instantly increase everywhere.
The Tudors are tedious af. Cromwell and the Stuarts - that's the correct history jam.
Ghosting someone on a dating app is not rude. It's the most comfortable and polite way to end a conversation that isn't going anywhere

English belongs to Americans just as much as it does to English people. The English people who moved to America had the same rights to the language as those who stayed, and they passed it on to their descendants.
Seedless raspberry jam should, by law, be labelled Baby Food For Adults and should be ruinously expensive.

Circumcision should not be legal before the age of 16 - with the exception of medical emergencies. Arbitrarily cutting a piece of a baby's dick off years before they can consent or understand why is deranged.
Companies who capitalise their brand name, or put the ® or ™ symbol after the name, outside of their logo are just making themselves look pretentious. You aren't drinking NESCAFÉ®, it's Nescafé.
I hope children these days appreciate how many Marvel films are being made for them. We didn't have all this when I was little.
If people are allowed a fag break at work I should be allowed a pint break. It's my health I'm damaging, not anyone else's.

If bosses really cared about productivity and output, they'd cancel 3/4 of the meetings on the calendar. All meetings do is make managers feel like they're working and force everyone else to stay late so they can finish their work.
What exactly has Dave Grohl done musically to be constantly referred to as the greatest rock drummer? Can't think of one stand out drum performance.
It shouldn't be vaguely cool to admit you're bad at maths, it discourages learning. It should be taboo - like saying you're a terrible driver, or shit in bed.
Grumpy bus drivers should be made to wear clownface.
I like to read the Personal Life section of Eric Clapton's Wikipedia entry while muttering 'Holy fuck' repeatedly.
There is no subject under the sun that's so fascinating, so interesting, that it can't be made monotous and dull by an Alan Yentob or Melvin Bragg documentary.
